VietNamNet Bridge - President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev is paying a working visit to Vietnam from May 18-20 at the invitation of President Truong Tan Sang , which aims to embrace bilateral economic ties .
Establishing diplomatic ties in 1992 , Vietnam and Azerbaijan have enjoyed good political relations on the foundation of the traditional friendship built in the time of the Soviet Union .
Last year , Vice Chairman of National Assembly Uong Chu Luu and Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs Nguyen Phuong Nga also visited Azerbaijan .
The same year , Azerbaijan opened its embassy in Vietnam .
In 2010 , the two countries signed an agreement on visa exemption for diplomatic passport holders and a protocol on cooperation between the two foreign ministries .

Their two - way trade reached 325 million USD in 2013 , a tenfold increase from the previous year , with Vietnam exporting mainly mobile phones , computers , electronics and seafood while importing crude oil and petrol from the market .

A1: mobile phones , computers , electronics and seafood

The Vietnam National Oil and Gas Group ( PetroVietnam ) opened its office in Azerbaijan in 2011 with the aim of enhancing links with local partners .
Vietnam is seeking to participate in some oil and gas projects in Azerbaijan .
